name: BulletookTitle
description:
A game entry made in few days for the BulletHell Jam 2022. 

You must dig you a way to rooms depper and depper,  and find more and more powerfull weapons, defend against more and more enemies. 

Controls:

  • Move : WASD / ZQSD / OKLM
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Dash: SHIFT / ALT
  • Grab Weapon / Open Chest: E / I
  • Switch Weapon: F / J
  • Pause Game : P

I strongly avdise you to read the "How To Play" if you don't want to dive in the unknow and be stuck in the spawn room.

Known bugs: 

  • Weapon can spawn out of player's hand after being grabbed. Fix: switch your weapon.
  • Sometimes walls can't be destroyed. Fix: 
    • Use a rocket launcher to destroy "invicible" walls. 
    • Try shooting the "wall tile" at it's corners.
    • ???

Credits:

  • Art: Hand-Made
  • Music: MOKKA - Synthetic Pleasures
  • Sounds: Freesound.org
